bike.description: Low stand-over Y-style frame design with full wrap chainguard, fenders and training wheels

components.description: Electro-plated black steel 16H rims with ball-bearing’ed hubs & 14G nickel-plated spokes
Cold-forged steel, electro-plated black finish, 3 1/2" arms, 28T chainring
BMX style, 120mm rise x 460mm wide, with safety bar pad & safety bell
Alloy head with front facing removable cap, 40mm extension, 130mm quill
